SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT06
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is issued by the user to terminate the GPA session. This message cannot be issued by a synonym.
From: User To: GPA
Notes
Field 173: <day-time> represents the day and the time before which another Login cannot be performed. The Logout message is positively acknowledged and contains error code 01 if this field represents a date which is more than seven days after the current date. See Service Message 26 Logout Acknowledgement.
The Trailer Block is only present if the message is sent by a Test & Training LT and contains a TNG trailer.

SystemField.Name: day-time
SystemField.description: The date and time, local to the user, in the format DDHHMM.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: day-time
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Date and time are always given as local, unless otherwise specified. Local time for the SWIFTNetwork is in GMT.

Validation.actionmessage: "Invalid day-time '" + $value + "'. day-time should be in format ddHHmm."
